Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsthis recent sighting ties into a sighting that my wife and i also had on 10\18\08, at about 10:30 p.m.that sighting is the most dramatic sighting that my wife and i have ever experienced.on 10\18\08 my wife and i were on our way back from up north about 35 min north bellevue on m66 when my notices a bright light in the sky and asked me to look.proceeded to pull over to the side of the road.we sat silently for a minute, there was no traffic at all.as we studied the light, asked my wife to grab the video camera from the back seat.my wife couldnt find it so i proceeded to turn on my emergency flashers and get it myself.once we got the camera out and on the object it started to move towards us freaking my wife and myself out because we had kids in the car and did not know what to expect with all this going on,i had yet to begin recording and as soon as i hit the record button the bright glistening light dimmed out like theater lighting and began to move away while only showing one solid red light and one flashing red light.the object flew across the road and away from us then back across again while still moving away.we captured about ten seconds of this then unable to find it with camera so we sat and watched the rest of the objects activity.then tonight at about 7:34 p.m. a light with similar values is in the southern sky moving east to west.i recorded this object also for 5 mins.disc is not formatted yet.
